EmailTemplate.name: AWS ReInvent FY18 Nurture.Turbonomic AWS Webinar Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] 3 Ways Automation Can Cut Your AWS Bill by 30%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-aws-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbonomic_aws_webinar]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
If your hybrid cloud environment is growing rapidly and you’re being asked to reign in AWS bills – know that you’re not alone. All too often, our customers tell us that the full promise of the cloud can’t be realized due to overwhelming complexity, which drives substantial excess cost.
Learn 3 ways that Turbonomic helps customers, today, reduce their AWS costs by 30% (or more) through self-managing cloud operations – from the initial migration to the day-to-day decisions needed to constantly optimize IaaS and PaaS instances, storage tiers, and RDS databases.
Register now to get IMMEDIATE access to our webinar 3 Ways Automation Can Cut Your AWS Bill by 30% <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-aws-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbonomic_aws_webinar]]>
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-aws-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbonomic_aws_webinar]]>
